title: sudden dc from a game
body: I just got dc'd & booted all the way back to my home screen with no way to reconnect, ping is fine, the game was fine, but i don't know what caused it, and i don't know if this happened to everyone else in that game

replies.body: Hmmmm you might have encountered a rather rare scenario when the game actually crashed entirely from the server. If you weren't ever able to reconnect and don't see the match being played anymore, then no worries as you are free to requeue and you won't be hit with any penalties for leaving said match.
